text: Prince Harry loves Rugby match but it might pretty difficult for him without attending without Meghan Markle. While spending his weekend in London, the royal family member went to The Stoop for an afternoon of matches. The Patron of England Rugby watched England's Red Roses vs. Wales in the Women's Six Nations AKA Rugby's Greatest Championship. Photographers caught Harry in the stands as he wore a black trench coat and light blue tie while clapping and cheering throughout the game. After Red Roses'victory by 52 - 0, the bride - to - be met the players and coaches from both teams. Now to Twickenham for @ EnglandRugby v @ WelshRugbyUnion # sixnations First Prince Harry is meeting beneficiaries of @ TheRugbyCharity,
